content: this into a hat with a folded brim repeat rounds 6 through 10 two additional times then continue with rounds 16-18 to finish off the hat round 16 1 half_double_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 1 does not count 60 sts round 17 1 single_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 1 60 sts round 18 1 scblo in in the back loop of every st of the round slip into the first st to close round tie off 60 sts copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs video tutorial available on youtube llc all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use @juantheyarnaddict only it may not be reproduced distributed or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished please like/share/subscribe items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends
